title: Impact
subtitle: Global Research of the Information Technology in Modern World
Network_Security_intro: The project is about the research and statistics of global network security.
Health_Care_intro: The project is research statistics on health and disease risk.
Weather_intro: The project is about the research and statistics of the climate change crisis.

Goal3: Design the system into visual and user-friendly.
StoryBase_intro: The project is a survey about people's culture and historical expectations.
